creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: pair of gloves with wide gauntlets on each wrist; beaded pink, red and white flower blossom on back of each hand; two blue and one red daffodil-shaped flowers with green stems and leaves in beads on each wrist; light tan leather; received mounted together and framed
title: Pair of gloves
